title: A question to ADC Mains
body:
Hey, I have been playing LoL for a while and adc used to be my main role back in the days. My champion pool is pretty small and consist of: {{champion:104}} {{champion:42}} {{champion:21}} . Problem is Corki is the only meta champ right now. I often get yelled at when I pick MF even if I have a 70% win ratio with her. 

So ADC mains, do you think is it possible to climb in elo with these champs ? I don't really like the meta champs like Kalista, Vayne, Jinx and Tristana.
